statements: UPDATE lighting_design SET fixture_type='LED', fixture_brand='XYZ Lighting' WHERE fixture_id=101;
UPDATE lighting_design SET installation_instructions='Please refer to the manual for installation steps.', client_id=201, fixture_specifications='Color temperature: 4000K' WHERE fixture_id=102;
UPDATE lighting_design SET fixture_type='LED', fixture_specifications='5000 lumens', client_id=101 WHERE fixture_id=1;
UPDATE lighting_design SET installation_instructions='Turn clockwise to lock', fixture_brand='Philips', client_id=102, fixture_type='Fluorescent' WHERE fixture_id=2;
UPDATE lighting_fixtures SET power_consumption = 50 WHERE fixture_id = 1;
UPDATE installation_instructions SET instruction_details = 'Turn off power supply before installation' WHERE instruction_id = 2
UPDATE lighting_fixtures SET power_consumption = 100 WHERE fixture_id = 1;
UPDATE installation_instructions SET instruction_details = 'Ensure proper grounding for fixture installation' WHERE fixture_id = 1;
UPDATE lighting_fixture SET wattage = 60 WHERE fixture_id = 1;
UPDATE installation_instruction SET steps = 'Connect wires to power source' WHERE instruction_id = 2;
UPDATE lighting_fixture SET fixture_name = 'LED Ceiling Light', wattage = 30 WHERE fixture_id = 1;
UPDATE installation_instruction SET steps = 'Step 1: Attach the base plate. Step 2: Install the light bulbs.' WHERE fixture_id = 1;
UPDATE lighting_fixtures SET wattage = 60 WHERE model = 'ABC123';
UPDATE installation_instructions SET instructions = 'Turn clockwise to install' WHERE fixture_id = 1;
UPDATE lighting_fixtures SET price = 49.99, wattage = 60 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE clients SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE lighting_fixtures SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE wattage > 100
UPDATE client_consultations SET notes = 'Follow up required for project XYZ' WHERE meeting_date = '2023-01-15'
